author: ColdFusion
description:
Go to https://ground.news/coldfusion to compare news coverage, spot media bias, and avoid algorithms. Try Ground News today and get 40% off your subscription.

BP may be a household name, but their track record for safety is one of the worst in the oil and gas industry. Unfortunately, this has led to many needless deaths and ecological damage that's mind-boggling to comprehend. Where did it all go wrong? In this episode we explore.

Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1pLt2O1C5fwKatAQQy9L994YsplCJyX30kKe5zOv6OaU/edit?usp=drivesdk
